Interface HotelSystem

All Known Implementing Classes:
Hotel
public interface HotelSystem
Interface: HotelSystem Date: November 20, 2025 Programmers: Mahfuz Ahmed, Michael Garcia Description: This interface defines the methods for the Hotel management system operations. It specifies all the methods that need to be implemented in the back-end hotel files that manages all the functionality, such as user authentication, account management, payment processing, reservation management, employee managemenet, housekeeping, and manager reporting. This interface uses no internal data structures as it only defines the method signatures. This interface follows the interface formatting, allowing for implementation throughout necessary files. This allows many implementations such as our file-based approach without changing any dependent code.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mahfuz Ahmed, Michael Garcia

  • Method Details

    • Login

      boolean Login(String username, String password)
      Authenticates a user login attempt.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to login
      password - The password of the user to login
      Returns:
      true if the username and password match a valid account in customers.txt file, false otherwise

    • CreateAccount

      boolean CreateAccount(String username, String password)
      Creates a new customer account in the system.
      Parameters:
      username - Any username of the customer's choice
      password - Any password of the customer's choice
      Returns:
      true if the account was successfully created, false otherwise.

    • Payment

      boolean Payment(String customer, double amount, String method)
      Records a payment transaction in the system.
      Parameters:
      customer - The username of the customer making the payment
      amount - The payment amount
      method - The payment method used such as credit, debit, or cash
      Returns:
      true if the paymenrt was successfully recorded, false otherwise.

    • Reservation

      boolean Reservation(String customer, String roomNumber)
      Creates a room reservation for the user.
      Parameters:
      customer - The username of the customer making the payment
      roomNumber - The room number to be reserved
      Returns:

    • Employee

      boolean Employee(String username, String password)
      Authenticates employee login attempt.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the employee attempting to log in
      password - The password of the employee attempting to log in
      Returns:
      true is the username and password match a valid account in employees.txt file, false otherwise.

    • Housekeeping

      boolean Housekeeping(String roomNumber, String status)
      Updates the housekeeping status for a room.
      Parameters:
      roomNumber - The room number to update
      status - The new housekeeping status such as clean, dirty, or maintenance
      Returns:
      true is the status was successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • Manager

      void Manager(String report)
      Saves a manager report in the system.
      Parameters:
      report - The text report to be saved

    • viewReservations

      void viewReservations()
      Displays all current reservations in the system. Also outputs reservation information in the console.
